summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SVRN Tax Simulator - Brazilian tax reform calculator. Core functionality working correctly with one critical PDF generation bug identified.

critical_bugs.issue: jsPDF autoTable plugin not working - 'doc.autoTable is not a function' error
critical_bugs.root_cause: Version compatibility issue between jspdf v4.0.0 and jspdf-autotable v5.0.7
critical_bugs.error_details: TypeError: doc.autoTable is not a function at generatePDF function

passed_tests: ✅ Page loads correctly with dark mode theme
✅ All 4 input fields present and functional (Nome, Custo, Margem, Carga Tributária)
✅ Mathematical calculations 100% accurate (verified with test case: R$150 cost → R$288.46 current, R$344.83 suggested)
✅ Results display in proper cards (Cenário Atual, Cenário 2026, Recomendação SVRN)
✅ Input validation working (alerts for empty/invalid fields)
✅ Royal Blue (#0047AB) and Gold (#D4AF37) color scheme implemented
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix PDF generation by updating jsPDF to compatible version (recommend jspdf ^2.5.1 with jspdf-autotable ^3.8.2) or adjust import/initialization of autoTable plugin
